Sequence Information.Peptide Name: M-zodatoxin-Lt3b (M-ZDTX-Lt3b; Latarcin-3b, Ltc-3b; spiders, Arthropods, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.16735513]Gram-positive bacteria:Arthrobacter globiformis VKM Ac-1112 (MIC=0.7 µM), Bacillus subtilis VKM B-501 (MIC=2.9 µM);Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli DH5-alpha (MIC=23 µM), Escherichia coli MH1 (MIC=28 µM), Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1 (MIC>45 µM);Fungi:Pichia pastoris GS115 (MIC=23 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae Y190 (MIC=23 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.16735513]20% hemolytic activity at >120 μM against rabbit erythrocytes
Sequence Information.Function: Has hemolytic against Rabbit erythrocytes. Causes paralysis, but is not lethal when injected into insect (Musca domestica) larvae.

Literature.Title: Latarcins, antimicrobial and cytolytic peptides from the venom of the spider Lachesana tarabaevi (Zodariidae) that exemplify biomolecular diversity.
Literature.Author: Kozlov SA, Vassilevski AA, Feofanov AV, Surovoy AY, Karpunin DV, Grishin EV.
